Package net.kuujo.copycat.transport

The Transport layer provides a low-level interface via which Copycat clients and servers communicate.

Package net.kuujo.copycat.transport Description

The Transport layer provides a low-level interface via which Copycat clients and servers communicate.

A Transport is a simple provider for Client and Server objects. The Client and Server are the interfaces through which clients and servers communicate respectively.

Author:
Jordan Halterman
